text: Ara se mahila to tara prati asakta hayechila ebam tini'o tara prati asakta [1] haye paratena yadi na tini tara rabera nidarsana dekhate petena [2]. Ebhabe'i (ta hayechila), yate amara tara theke mandakaja o aslilata dura kare de'i [3]. Tini to chilena amadera mukhalisa ba bisud'dhacitta bandadera antarbhukta
